title: Is Graves really THAT good in teamfights?
body:
I feel like his range is wayyyy too low. It's so hard to kite an irelia + aatrox/jarvan (assuming I have a blitzcrank who goes ham every fight while I'm alone at the back).

I kept playing him and I usually don't really OWN my lane since the moment they lost a fight, the enemy will just freeze lane with 600 range.
